message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal, and I think it's fair considering its value.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I am only willing to pay $9500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to be closer to $11000 to make this work for me. The product is truly valuable, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny for you. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't exceed $10500. I hope this proposal works for you.
